target.name: Major Ultra Magnus - Infantry - City Commander

entry.question: When do I use this ability?
entry.answer: You use it before the game begins. You’ll put Ultra Magnus Armor onto Major Ultra Magnus, then shuffle the rest of your deck and draw 3 cards for your opening hand.

entry.tags: Major Ultra Magnus - Infantry - City Commander,Private Firedrive - Ground Command - Artillery
entry.question: Let's say I have Major Ultra Magnus in bot mode and Private Firedrive on the field, with Firedrive having 1 health remaining. If I attack with Ultra Magnus and trigger his bot mode ability, which causes Firedrive to die and I put the Duo-Charge Electrostatic Photon Cannon onto Ultra Magnus, what happens? Does Ultra Magnus get the +3 attack for this battle? Am I able to scrap cards from my hand to increase said attack?
entry.answer: Major Ultra Magnus will get the +3 attack, but since the long-name weapon was attached after he began his attack, the ability will not trigger and you will not be able to scrap any cards to add to your attack.

entry.question: If I have Major Ultra Magnus with 16 Damage on him and my opponent has Nemesis Prime with 15 Damage on him and I Attack Optimus Prime - Battlefield Legend, causing my bot mode skill to trigger, does this cause Major Ultra Magnus to be KO’d and Nemesis Prime to be KO’d therefore no combat with Optimus?

entry.tags: Specialist Ratchet - Engineering - Rescue & Repair,Private Trailbreaker - Infantry - Fortification & Defense,Major Ultra Magnus - Infantry - City Commander
entry.question: For Wave 3 Ratchet, Ultra Magnus, Trailbreaker and Wheeljack. Do you search for their related card before you draw starting hand or after?
entry.answer: Before the game starts, find their related card, shuffle, then draw three cards for your opening hand.
